column2: "prediction": "A US military court has sentenced a sergeant to death for killing 13 people and injuring others in a shooting rampage at a military base in Afghanistan in 2009. The sergeant
column3: who was identified as Nidal Hasan
column4: had been accused of premeditated murder and attempted murder. The court found him guilty and sentenced him to death
column5: with the possibility of parole. The incident was described as the deadliest shooting ramp"}
